mapper.sql: ID, PARTY_ID, INFO_SRC, QUERY_DATE, LETTER_OF_PRESENTATION, TITLE, DJK_LXYQ_TIMES, DJK_LJYQ_TIMES, DK_LXQX_TIMES, DK_LJQX_TIMES, SXBJ_YQ_CONDITION, BRANCHBADRECORD, NATIFLAG, NATURE_OF_UNIT, SCALE_OF_UNIT, ISALERTCORP, HAVELAWSUIT, BADLEADERFLAG
mapper.select: select a.*,b.PARTY_NAME partyName from TB_CSM_CREDIT_INFO a left join TB_CSM_PARTY b on a.PARTY_ID = b.PARTY_ID where a.PARTY_ID = #{partyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into TB_CSM_CREDIT_INFO (ID, PARTY_ID, INFO_SRC, QUERY_DATE, LETTER_OF_PRESENTATION, TITLE, DJK_LXYQ_TIMES, DJK_LJYQ_TIMES, DK_LXQX_TIMES, DK_LJQX_TIMES, SXBJ_YQ_CONDITION, BRANCHBADRECORD, NATIFLAG, NATURE_OF_UNIT, SCALE_OF_UNIT, ISALERTCORP, HAVELAWSUIT, BADLEADERFLAG ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infoSrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{queryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{letterOfPresentation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{djkLxyqTimes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{djkLjyqTimes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dkLxqxTimes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dkLjqxTimes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sxbjYqCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{branchbadrecord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{natiflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{natureOfUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scaleOfUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isalertcorp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{havelawsuit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{badleaderflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update TB_CSM_CREDIT_INFO
PARTY_ID = #{partyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INFO_SRC = #{infoSrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUERY_DATE = #{queryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LETTER_OF_PRESENTATION = #{letterOfPresentation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DJK_LXYQ_TIMES = #{djkLxyqTimes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DJK_LJYQ_TIMES = #{djkLjyqTimes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DK_LXQX_TIMES = #{dkLxqxTimes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DK_LJQX_TIMES = #{dkLjqxTimes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SXBJ_YQ_CONDITION = #{sxbjYqCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BRANCHBADRECORD = #{branchbadrecord,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

SCALE_OF_UNIT = #{scaleOfUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISALERTCORP = #{isalertcorp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HAVELAWSUIT = #{havelawsuit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BADLEADERFLAG = #{badleaderflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update TB_CSM_CREDIT_INFO set PARTY_ID = #{partyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFO_SRC = #{infoSrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUERY_DATE = #{queryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LETTER_OF_PRESENTATION = #{letterOfPresentation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DJK_LXYQ_TIMES = #{djkLxyqTimes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DJK_LJYQ_TIMES = #{djkLjyqTimes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DK_LXQX_TIMES = #{dkLxqxTimes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DK_LJQX_TIMES = #{dkLjqxTimes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SXBJ_YQ_CONDITION = #{sxbjYqCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRANCHBADRECORD = #{branchbadrecord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NATIFLAG = #{natiflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NATURE_OF_UNIT = #{natureOfUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCALE_OF_UNIT = #{scaleOfUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISALERTCORP = #{isalertcorp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HAVELAWSUIT = #{havelawsuit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BADLEADERFLAG = #{badleaderflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
